titleStmt.title: Some papers writ in the year 1664 In answer to a letter, concerning the practice of physick in England. By Dr. C. T. Published at the request of a friend and several fellows of the College of Physicians.
titleStmt.author: Terne, Christopher, 1620-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for James Allestry, at the Rose and Crown, in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Copy has MS. attribution on title page: "Tim Clarke".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
